data.lyric:
[ti:Be Alright]
[ar:Dean Lewis]
[al:Be Alright (Acoustic)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Be Alright - Dean Lewis
[00:04.36]I look up from the ground
[00:05.38]To see your sad and teary eyes
[00:07.64]You look away from me
[00:09.24]And I see there's something you're trying to hide
[00:11.27]And I reach for your hand but it's cold
[00:13.75]You pull away again
[00:15.30]And I wonder what's on your mind
[00:18.55]And then you say to me you made a dumb mistake
[00:23.46]You start to tremble and your voice begins to break
[00:26.36]You say the cigarettes on the counter weren't your friend's
[00:29.04]They were my mate's
[00:30.50]And I feel the colour draining from my face
[00:35.12]And my friend said
[00:36.77]"I know you love her but it's over mate
[00:40.63]It doesn't matter put the phone away
[00:44.26]It's never easy to walk away let her go
[00:50.22]It'll be alright"
[00:51.76]So I still look back at all the messages you'd sent
[00:55.27]And I know it wasn't right but it was messing with my head
[00:59.40]And everything deleted like the past yeah it was gone
[01:02.78]And when I touched your face I could tell you're moving on
[01:07.02]But it's not the fact that you kissed him yesterday
[01:10.28]It's the feeling of betrayal that I just can't seem to shake
[01:14.20]And everything I know tells me that I should walk away
[01:17.95]But I just wanna stay
[01:22.66]And my friend said
[01:23.96]"I know you love her but it's over mate
[01:28.06]It doesn't matter put the phone away
[01:31.84]It's never easy to walk away let her go
[01:37.73]It'll be okay
[01:39.39]It's gonna hurt for a bit of time
[01:43.10]So bottoms up let's forget tonight
[01:46.90]You'll find another and you'll be just fine
[01:50.03]Let her go"
[01:54.12]But nothing heals the past like time
[02:01.60]And they can't steal
[02:05.49]The love you're born to find
[02:09.29]But nothing heals the past like time
[02:16.84]And they can't steal
[02:20.66]The love you're born to find
[02:26.10]"I know you love her but it's over mate
[02:30.64]It doesn't matter put the phone away
[02:34.39]It's never easy to walk away let her go
[02:40.28]It'll be okay
[02:42.04]It's gonna hurt for a bit of time
[02:45.66]So bottoms up let's forget tonight
[02:49.54]You'll find another and you'll be just fine
[02:52.66]Let her go"
[02:55.41]It'll be alright
[02:59.21]It'll be alright
[03:02.98]It'll be alright
[03:06.82]It'll be alright
[03:10.60]It'll be alright
data.trans:
[ti:Be Alright]
[ar:Dean Lewis]
[al:Be Alright (Acoustic)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.36]我抬头仰望天空
[00:05.38]看见你被悲伤模糊的泪眼
[00:07.64]你把目光从我身上移开
[00:09.24]我知道你想隐瞒些什么
[00:11.27]我努力握住你的手 是那么的冰凉
[00:13.75]你又一次离开我
[00:15.30]我不知道你究竟在想什么
[00:18.55]然后你对我说 你犯了一个愚蠢的错误
[00:23.46]你开始颤抖 声音开始颤抖
[00:26.36]你说那柜台上的烟不是你的朋友
[00:29.04]而是我的
[00:30.50]而我也能感觉到自己渐渐苍白的脸色
[00:35.12]我的朋友们说
[00:36.77]"我知道你爱她 但是一切都结束了 朋友
[00:40.63]都不重要了 放下你手里的电话吧
[00:44.26]想要坦然离开的确不容易 放手吧
[00:50.22]一切都会过去的"
[00:51.76]我最后一次翻阅你给我发的每一条短信
[00:55.27]我知道我不应该这样做 但是我的脑子一片混乱
[00:59.40]把所有都删掉 就像忘记我们的过去 一切都不复了
[01:02.78]我抚摸你脸庞的那一刻 我能看出你的心早已走远
[01:07.02]但是却没料到 昨天你背着我亲吻了他
[01:10.28]这种被人背叛的感觉 我不知道要怎样摆脱
[01:14.20]我了解的所有都在告诉我 坦然放下 继续向前
[01:17.95]但是我只是想留在这里
[01:22.66]我的朋友们说
[01:23.96]"我知道你爱她 但是一切都结束了 朋友
[01:28.06]都不重要了 放下你手里的电话吧
[01:31.84]想要坦然离开的确不容易 放手吧
[01:37.73]一切都会过去的
[01:39.39]我知道你会难过一段时间
[01:43.10]陷入低谷的你 忘记今晚的事吧
[01:46.90]你会找到另一个爱你的人 你会好起来的
[01:50.03]别再留恋她了"
[01:54.12]没什么能比时间更能治愈曾经的伤
[02:01.60]也没什么能窃走
[02:05.49]你注定邂逅的那段爱情
[02:09.29]没什么能比时间更能治愈曾经的伤
[02:16.84]也没什么能窃走
[02:20.66]你注定邂逅的那段爱情
[02:26.10]"我知道你爱她 但是一切都结束了 朋友
[02:30.64]都不重要了 放下你手里的电话吧
[02:34.39]想要坦然离开的确不容易 放手吧
[02:40.28]一切都会过去的
[02:42.04]我知道你会难过一段时间
[02:45.66]陷入低谷的你 忘记今晚的事吧
[02:49.54]你会找到另一个爱你的人 你会好起来的
[02:52.66]别再留恋她了"
[02:55.41]一切都会过去的
[02:59.21]一切都会过去的
[03:02.98]一切都会过去的
[03:06.82]一切都会过去的
[03:10.60]一切都会过去的
